item.title: The inappropriateness of significance tests
item.description: All references to statistical hypothesis testing and statistical significance should be removed from the paper. I ask that you delete p values as well as comments about statistical significance. If you do not agree with my standards (concerning the inappropriateness of significance tests), you should feel free to argue the point, or simply ignore what you may consider to be my misguided view, by publishing elsewher.
